Wir gr√º√üen Euch!

 Wir, ukrainische M√§dchen und M√§nner in Stuttgart und Umgebung, haben uns zusammen geschlossen und die Gruppe Helpüá∫üá¶ UKRAINE gegr√ºndet!

 Wir haben jetzt ein PayPal-Spendenkonto eingerichtet. 

 Zweck der Sammlung: Kauf notwendiger Medikamente, die heute in der Ukraine nicht erh√§ltlich sind.

. (Matthias Schmidt)

zusammen.

originalText:
#stuttgart   #helpstuttgart   #Stuttgart 

Wir gr√º√üen Euch!

 Wir, ukrainische M√§dchen und M√§nner in Stuttgart und Umgebung, haben uns zusammen geschlossen und die Gruppe Helpüá∫üá¶ UKRAINE gegr√ºndet!

 Wir haben jetzt ein PayPal-Spendenkonto eingerichtet. 

 Zweck der Sammlung: Kauf notwendiger Medikamente, die heute in der Ukraine nicht erh√§ltlich sind.

 PayPal:  helpforukraine22@gmail.com . (Matthias Schmidt)

 Medikamente werden in ein Lager in Polen gebracht, dann √ºberquert ein LKW mit einer Sondergenehmigung unverz√ºglich die Grenze unseres Landes entlang des gr√ºnen Korridors!

Wir arbeiten direkt mit  https://www.plast.org.ua/ zusammen.

In der Einheit liegt unsere Starke!

sourceData.text:
‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èToday at 10:00 we will meet as a focus group to further coordinate the work of the group and volunteers. 

Spontaneous fundraisers are currently on pause, as we do not have time to check cars, drivers, where and 

Humanitarian aid will leave the "Help to Ukrainians in Germany" group ONLY with verified LKW and to specific destinations. The Verkhovna Rada is in touch with us, and we will focus only on their requests at the moment.
 
‚ÄºÔ∏èWe do not collect furniture, clothes, toys‚ÄºÔ∏è But we are looking for volunteers who work with refugee centers to donate what we have ALREADY collected.

originalText:
‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èToday at 10:00 we will meet as a focus group to further coordinate the work of the group and volunteers.

Humanitarian aid will leave the "Help to Ukrainians in Germany" group ONLY with verified LKW and to specific destinations. The Verkhovna Rada is in touch with us, and we will focus only on their requests at the moment.
 
‚ÄºÔ∏èWe do not collect furniture, clothes, toys‚ÄºÔ∏è But we are looking for volunteers who work with refugee centers to donate what we have ALREADY collected.

sourceData.author: Kirill
text:
Hello everyone! We have created a chat to coordinate volunteers at the humanitarian aid collection point in Haus der Statistik (Otto-Braun-Stra√üe 70-72, building B), 10178 Berlin 
In the chat in the attached message you will find a schedule table. Enter your names to free timeslots.
Please forward to anyone who wants to help!

originalText:
Hello everyone! We have created a chat to coordinate volunteers at the humanitarian aid collection point in Haus der Statistik (Otto-Braun-Stra√üe 70-72, building B), 10178 Berlin 
In the chat in the attached message you will find a schedule table. Enter your names to free timeslots.
Please forward to anyone who wants to help!
 
 https://t.me/volunteersberlin
